# Load example data

Source: http://www.ats.ucla.edu/stat/r/dae/logit.htm

```{r}
dat <- read.csv("http://www.ats.ucla.edu/stat/data/binary.csv")
dat$rank <- factor(dat$rank)
fit_glm <- glm(admit ~ gre + gpa + rank, data = dat, family = "binomial")
```

# Examples

## Calculate OR for specific increment step

```{r}
calc_oddsratio.glm(fit_glm, dat, list(gre = 380, gpa = 5))

o1 <- 0.002264*380
o2 <- 0.002264*482

o3 <- exp(o2 - o1)

exp(0.002264*102) * 102
```
